name: THOMTWIN Ep1 (Obunga, Thomas, Nextbots)
description:
THOMTWIN is the story of twin sisters Jessi and Monica. 

They are shy, so if you look at their faces, they will attack you.

 Jessi will always follow you, and Monica will hide and wait for you.

 I hope you can solve this mystery. 

John from the past... 1959...

Manual

Move - W, A, S, D

Shoot - Mouse Left Button

(When Shooting, the monster becomes temporarily stiff.)
